message: I like it, I think the idea is great, the execution is great, and I hope it can carve out a niche for itself in what is a rather crowded space
talented people in these fields don't have trouble finding jobs
and if they do, why would they post their resume in a place where fewer people can see it?
It seems to be an invite-only stackoverflow-type site?
It's not clear from the front-page what it does
the value of your service is nonobvious

I would say you definitely have to look further than the front page to "get it", at least I did... once you're in there's a nice explanation of what goes on, and I think that really needs to be brought forward to convince people to sign up
@koopa58 geez, and I thought talentopoly was a bad domain name
@chadselph hehe :) Imo forrst is a little easier to remember. But yeah, not the best domain names.
